name: Bedrock Server
description: The Bedrock Server is a simple JSON repeater designed to demonstrate a simple API, and be used in test suites requiring JSON responses from a remote host, such as com.brettonw.bedrock.

version.description: Return the build version for the current WAR.

display-name.description: The display name of the service.

ip.description: Return the IP address of the requestor.
The IP (v4) address of the requestor

post-data.description: Echo the contents of the post data.

headers.description: Return the request headers as a JSON object.

host.description: name of the host the request is to

echo.description: Repeat the contents of the query.
